## Forex Candle Strength Analyzer

This project is a web-based application for analyzing candlestick patterns and strength in forex trading.

### Project Features:
- Real-time candlestick pattern analysis
- Technical indicators (RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands)
- Buy/sell signal generation
- Mobile responsive trading interface
- Forex data visualization with charts

### Development Guidelines:
- Use modern JavaScript ES6+ features
- Implement responsive design with CSS Grid/Flexbox
- Focus on real-time data processing and visualization
- Ensure mobile-first approach for trading on mobile devices
- Use Chart.js or similar for financial charting

### Code Style:
- Use camelCase for JavaScript variables and functions
- Use kebab-case for CSS classes
- Comment complex trading logic and calculations
- Maintain clean separation of concerns (HTML/CSS/JS)
